unnormalised: ## Thoddo Fuddem Vhorta: Mhoji Diwali Dhon Uzzo
normalised: Thoddo Dhana Dillear Zaitar Falea: Mhoji Diwali Donate Korcheachi Mohim

unnormalised: Diwali mhajea familik fott ani mitthai poros odhik asat. To ek chintpacho, kritagyatacho ani somazak portun divpacho vell. Hea vorsak, mhaka junim kapddam dhon korpafon thodde odhik faideachem korunk zai aslem. Andherintlea "Sneha Sadan" hea sthanik anathashramak maddat korunk mhaka ek lhan dhon uzzo ayojit korunk zai aslem. Mhaka lhan lakx: Rs. 5000-e bhaginn vostu vikto gheunk zai asleo.
normalised: Diwali mhajea familik sodanch divleancho uzvadd ani mithai poros chodd aslem. To ek vechar korpacho, upkar manpacho, ani samajak portun dinvcho vell. Hea vorsak, mhaka fatlim pornim kopddeanchem daan diunche poros thodem chodd foll divpi karvai korchi asli. Andherintlea "Sneha Sadan," hea thodde familiche asro aslolea ghorak aadhar divonk hanv ek lhan daan diuncheak mohim ghoddounk nirnoy ghethlo. Hanvem ek nommro udishttheak survath keli: panch hozar rupeank thodde gorjeche vostu ghevcheak.

unnormalised: Mhoji survatichi yojana sopi asli: ixttank ani familik vicharunk. Mhanv mhoji upakramachi ek WhatsApp status varti dili, ani sangile ki fund koxim vapartale tenachoddi sarkem spoxt zatole. Ghoddke bhitor, mhaka khuxi bhogli. Mhajea kazin Priya, lagich UPI zori Rs. 1000 dhon kele. Mhajea balpnnachea ixttan, Rohan, Rs. 500 dhon kele. Delhiant aslelea mhajea buan pon Rs. 2000 dhon kele.
normalised: Mhozo survatikacho plan sozo aslo: ixttank ani familichea lokank magchem. Hanvem mhaji karvai vollkhun WhatsAppacher status dourlo, puroponnant dhon koso vaportolo mhunn sangun. Kallkhorak bhitor, hanv khuxi zali. Mhojea cousinn, Priyan okamath U-P-I vorvim ek hozar rupeanchem transfer kelem. Mhojea ballponnchea ixttan, Rohanen panchxim rupeanchem daan kelem. Dehlint astolea maje bhuaien don hozar rupeancho hisso dillo.

unnormalised: Social media-r ponddal sodanch urta. Mhanv Sneha Sadan-ak zai aslelea vostunchea detaling divn ek fundraising page-ak link varti keli. Mhanv sangilem ki fokot Rs. 250 ek bhurgeak ek satteachem posttik jevonn divonk xekta. Mhanv hem-ui dhakhoilem ki Rs. 1000 xikxonnik vostu vikto gheunk xekta.
normalised: Social mediacher chalna choltali. Sneha Sadanachea khas gorjek vollkhun, hanvem dhon ekthe korcheachem pan dourlem. Hanvem mhunnlem fokot dhai shat rupean ek bhurgeank ek satodyachim poshtik bhojnam diunk zata mhunn. Hanvem tori distaunk ghatlelem ki ek hozar rupean shikxonachim vostu ghevpak zata mhunn.

unnormalised: Mhaka ek suchn mellili: konnem-ui Rs. 50 dhon kele! Mhaka poili thorik thoddi ashcharya bhogli, punn taka mhaka kollit zalem ki dor ek yogdan, kitloch lhan asun, motacho aslo. To ek vidhyarthi aslo, disone, aplea jebantlea poixeanchi saving korun. Taka mhaka ugddas zalo ki udarta kiteakui asunk xekta, punn niyoti bhaxen. Dor ek rupiya kornak favo zatat.
normalised: Mhaka suchnai mellali: konnen tori ponch rupeanchem daan kelem! Hanv survatek thoddi ojap zali, punn magir mhaka kollalem dor ek yogydan, kitlem lhan aslem tori, mahatvachem mhunn. To ek vidhyarthi aslo, mhunn dista, apnnachea pocket duddvank sambhallun. Tannem mhaka ugddas kelo ki dayallponn kitlem daan diunke mhunn nhoi, punn kitlea monan dillo mhunn. Dor ek rupyo hea kamak aavshyak.

unnormalised: Tevellach, dhon unexpect kednak bhageak suruvat zali. Mhajea adlea companyantlea ek junnea collegian Rs. 2500 dhon kele. Mhajea kothak chintun ek dayaallu ajnani lokan Rs. 1500 dhon kele. Rs. 5000-e mhajea survatechea lakxe poros vegim chodd zalem. Satteachea xeuttak, amkam Rs. 12750-e melunk pavle.
normalised: Zait tim, daan apelyateli sudhanche poros bhitor yetale. Mhojea fatlea kampanichea ek pornea sangelek don hozar panch shat rupeanchem daan kelem. Ek dayall pornean, mhojea kanniek hallaun, ek hozar panch shat rupeancho hisso dillo. Udixttachem duddvan pach hozar rupeak vadlem. Sattodyachea shevotak, ami bara hozar saat shat ani ponch rupya ekthe kele.

unnormalised: Melun ail'lea fundak lagun, amkam fokot bhaginn vostu nhui punn Sneha Sadan-antlea bhurgeank xikxonnik khellani ani pustakam vikto gheunk pavlim. Amkam te vostu ditle mhonn tankam hanstelelem dekhun ek khup faideachem anubhav aslo.
normalised: Ekthe kelolea duddvanni, ami fokot gorjeche vostu nhoi, punn zai axil'lim shikxonnache khellnim ani pustokan Sneha Sadanantlea bhurgeank ghevnk pavle. Tim vostu dillear tachim tonddam uzvaddtat mhunn dekhun hanv khub khuxi zali.

unnormalised: Hea Diwali-k, mhaka kollit zalem ki dhayak dolyeache lhan kornakui khup motachem kortolem. Ani kednank, utsav manhovpacho chodd vantto aplea ashivachya vantteak lhan naslealea lokank ditlem. Mhaka aplea fuddak Dhon Uzzo yojana astai, axea asta ki Rs. 12750 poros odhik dhon zatole!
normalised: Hea Diwaliak, hanvem shiklem ki kitlem legith lhan dayallichem kam vhodd bodol ghevnk yeta mhunn. Ani kednaim, utsav manovpachech borem rit mhunnlear je konn gorjenant tankam ami mellil'le ashirvad vanttche. Hanv mhaji fattli daanache mohim ghoddouunk yevjeun asa, bara hozar saat shat ani ponch rupya poros chodd utthounk bhavun!
